movie.title: Hollywood Homicide
movie.description_intro: When not solving murders in Tinseltown, Detective Joe Gavilan and his rookie partner Kasey Calden both moonlight in other fields: Gavilan sells real estate (poorly), and Calden aspires to become an actor (Brando, namely). Assigned to the vicious in-club slaying of a promising young rap act, the two detective delve into the recording industry where they hope to find answers - ideally ones that also come with property buyers or auditions.
movie.description_full: When not solving murders in Tinseltown, Detective Joe Gavilan and his rookie partner Kasey Calden both moonlight in other fields: Gavilan sells real estate (poorly), and Calden aspires to become an actor (Brando, namely). Assigned to the vicious in-club slaying of a promising young rap act, the two detective delve into the recording industry where they hope to find answers - ideally ones that also come with property buyers or auditions.

movies.title: Tinsel - The Lost Movie About Hollywood
movies.title_english: Tinsel - The Lost Movie About Hollywood
movies.title_long: Tinsel - The Lost Movie About Hollywood (2021)
movies.summary: A melancholy and affectionate look at the global obsession with movies, "TINSEL - The Lost Movie About Hollywood" was lost for 30 years and never shown publicly. An outside-in, inside-out view of the Motion Picture Industry circa 1990, it is a film about fame in general and the love of movies in particular. The film includes new footage offering perspective from the 21st century. The film examines the uncertain future the industry faces in its second century, as technology and new platforms change the movie-watching experience forever.
movies.description_full: A melancholy and affectionate look at the global obsession with movies, "TINSEL - The Lost Movie About Hollywood" was lost for 30 years and never shown publicly. An outside-in, inside-out view of the Motion Picture Industry circa 1990, it is a film about fame in general and the love of movies in particular. The film includes new footage offering perspective from the 21st century. The film examines the uncertain future the industry faces in its second century, as technology and new platforms change the movie-watching experience forever.

movies.title: Memoirs of a Murderer
movies.summary: A television reporter and a detective try to track down a serial killer known as the Tokyo Strangler.
movies.description_full: A television reporter and a detective try to track down a serial killer known as the Tokyo Strangler.
movies.synopsis: A television reporter and a detective try to track down a serial killer known as the Tokyo Strangler.

movies.title: The Disappearance of Eleanor Rigby: Him
movies.title_english: The Disappearance of Eleanor Rigby: Him
movies.title_long: The Disappearance of Eleanor Rigby: Him (2013)
movies.summary: A woman and man seemingly so in love finds their marriage is shaken to the core when life throws them a devastating curve. Now this New York couple must try to understand each other as they cope with loss and attempt to reclaim the life and love they once had.
movies.description_full: A woman and man seemingly so in love finds their marriage is shaken to the core when life throws them a devastating curve. Now this New York couple must try to understand each other as they cope with loss and attempt to reclaim the life and love they once had.

movies.title: Space Guardians 2
movies.summary: The Space Guardians reunite to battle the villainous space moose, Tar Tar the Third.
